data.description: An overview of the theory of industrial organization, including the study of oligopolistic behavior, monopolistic competition, product differentiation and the dynamic behavior of competitive industries under uncertainty.

data.description: Economic problems of individuals, firms and industries with emphasis on value, price, and distribution of income.
